name: E-66: The Menace Within
description:
E-66: The Menace Within is a third-person adventure game in which the player will take role of an agent working under cover in a space mining colony.

The main idea was to implement game world simulation where every NPC have a set of tasks that he choose to perform - mine mineral, guard location, patrol corridors, buy ammo from the trader/sell mined mineral, relax, etc.

This system should make game world exploration more natural, safe and controllable in habited area in comparison with dangerous tunnels outside of it and will be expanded in future.

Disclamer: the game is on a prototype stage and may contain bugs, and also don't represent final quality.
